title: Oz Lotto winning numbers revealed as the prize jackpots to $40million
text:
Thousands of hopeful Australians are checking their Oz Lotto tickets after the winning numbers were revealed.

The jackpot for Tuesday's night's draw rocketed to $40 million after the major prize went unclaimed for five weeks.

The numbers drawn were 35, 12, 37, 14, 5, 40 and 18.

The supplementary numbers were 16 and 10.

The Oz Lotto jackpot will soar even higher next week with no division one winners in Tuesday night's draw.

Thousands of Australians are checking their tickets after Tuesday night's Oz Lotto draw

Ten division two winners will share in $38,766.45 in prizemoney, including four from NSW/ACT.

One in six Australian adults were expected to have an entry in Tuesday night's draw.

'With less than three months left in 2019 and left in this decade, many players might be dreaming of how the next year and the next decade might look like for them with $40 million in their bank account,' The Lott spokesman Matthew Hart said.

Nine division one Oz Lotto winners have shared $235 million so far this year.

The Oz Lotto jackpot was last won in August by an Adelaide man who won $10 million.

There were no division one winners in Tuesday night's Oz Lotto $40million draw

It comes after three winners shared the massive $150 million Powerball jackpot which went off last month.

The prize jackpotted from $100million after no winners claimed the first division prize in the previous draw.

Lottery officials said around half of all adult Australians entered the Powerball draw, which eclipses the previous record prize of $107.6 million which went off in January.
description: Thousands of Australians are checking their Oz Lotto tickets after the winning numbers were revealed. The jackpot for Tuesday's night's draw rocketed to $40 million after it went unclaimed for five weeks.
authors: Kylie Stevens For Daily Mail Australia
